item.title: By: Damien
item.dc:creator: Damien
item.description: <p>Being the earlier adoptor that I usually am it has been hard for me to hold off on an iPhone. Financially that has been good - as I am still in contract with Orange. Hopefully the rumored 3g model is not too far off.</p>
item.content:encoded: Being the earlier adoptor that I usually am it has been hard for me to hold off on an iPhone. Financially that has been good – as I am still in contract with Orange. Hopefully the rumored 3g model is not too far off.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>I think 80gb is a *long* way off bearing in mind that the SSD for the Air is only 64gb and costs $999. It's going to be a couple of years before the price comes down sufficiently.<br /><br />The received wisdom at the moment is that there will be a 16gb iPhone with 3G announced some time around the summer. That will be the point when it starts to become interesting to me.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
I think 80gb is a *long* way off bearing in mind that the SSD for the Air is only 64gb and costs $999. It’s going to be a couple of years before the price comes down sufficiently.

The received wisdom at the moment is that there will be a 16gb iPhone with 3G announced some time around the summer. That will be the point when it starts to become interesting to me.

Matt

item.title: By: Curt Stone
item.dc:creator: Curt Stone
item.description: <p>Thanks for the summary, Matt. I was hoping for an 80 gig iPhone announcement. That's when I'll go for it.</p>
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the summary, Matt. I was hoping for an 80 gig iPhone announcement. That’s when I’ll go for it.

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>Of course <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /> The plan is for it to be my main net connection for the week so I don't have to lug my laptop around with me all the time like previous years.<br /><br />We'll see how it works out.<br /><br />Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
Of course http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ /> The plan is for it to be my main net connection for the week so I don’t have to lug my laptop around with me all the time like previous years.

We’ll see how it works out.

Matt

item.title: By: Terri Sciolla-Lynch
item.dc:creator: Terri Sciolla-Lynch
item.description: <p>Ooh Matt, I haven't seen the iPod Touch with the new bells and whistles. You're bringing it, right? <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: Ooh Matt, I haven’t seen the iPod Touch with the new bells and whistles. You’re bringing it, right? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />
